freelance.p1: Development of microservices for bank account management applications.
freelance.p2: Web development for streaming services such as Netflix, Disney and more.
freelance.stack: Java, Spring Boot, ReactJS, NextJS, TailwindCSS, MySQL

rootstack.p1: Development of functionality for government websites using Python with Flask, PHP Legacy and Laravel.
rootstack.p2: Ecommerce development, using Python 3 with Odoo.
rootstack.stack: Python, Flask, PHP, Laravel, C#, .NET Framework Drupal, Laravel, MySQL

messangi.p1: Development of user interfaces for an online messaging system, using Angular and Angular Material.

mobius.p1: Development of interfaces and business logic for the control and management system of automotive spare parts, using PHP with Laravel

galac.p1: Development and support of functionalities to the administrative accounting system
galac.stack: Visual Basic 6, C#, .NET Framework, Raw SQL, SQL server

binaural.p1: Development of an online store for a food distribution company, using Python with Odoo and OpenStreetMap.
binaural.p2: Development of functionalities for a web application for buying and selling real estate, using Angular, NodeJS, MongoDB, Express and OpenStreetMap.
binaural.stack: PHP, Python, Flask, Django, Odoo, OpenStreetMap, NodeJS, Express, Angular, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
